externalDocs.description: Learn more with the full Mailchimp API documentation.

post.description: Send a Mailchimp campaign. For RSS Campaigns, the campaign will send according to its schedule. All other campaigns will send immediately.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The unique id for the campaign.

default.description: An error generated by the Mailchimp API.

schema.title: Problem Detail Document

type.title: Problem Type
type.description: An absolute URI that identifies the problem type. When dereferenced, it should provide human-readable documentation for the problem type.

title.title: Error Title
title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It shouldn't change based on the occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

status.title: HTTP Status Code
status.description: The HTTP status code (RFC2616, Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.title: Error Message
detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. [Learn more about errors](/developer/guides/get-started-with-mailchimp-api-3/#Errors).
detail.example: The requested resource could not be found.

instance.title: Instance ID
instance.description: A string that identifies this specific occurrence of the problem. Please provide this ID when contacting support.
